name: Sky Outbreak
description:
Sky Outbreak!

Alpha version - I am open to suggestions!

Sky Outbreak is about blowing ships up! You can be different planes with different weapons and upgrades while you destroy ships throughout different levels, from the sea to an apocalyptic world!

Multiple Ships, Levels, Weapons and Upgrades!

In Sky Outbreak you get to choose from different types of ships! Maybe you like to be a tank who never dies! or maybe you want to be the fastest ship ever! But it doesn't end there! You can also customize with the Upgrades that you are given each level!

Oh my god, My ship is super fast but dies in two shoots

No worries! You can upgrade his health! Pft who needs health! I want more speed! There is also one for speed!

Now that you got the best ship in the world why don't you add a few extra weapons!?

  • Lasers
  • Bouncing Bullets
  • Grenades
  • And more!

In SkyOutbreak we like to give you several tools in where every person can chose which they feel more comfortable with!

Woah, I guess it does come with a lot of VariablesStart playing the game right now! You don't lose much!You can mail me for suggestions at: raptor0sp@gmail.com
